definitions.definition: a person chosen or appointed to act or speak for another or others, in particular.
examples: spokesperson, spokesman, spokeswoman, agent, official, mouthpiece a representative of the medical profession

definitions.definition: an agent of a firm who travels to potential clients to sell its products.
examples: salesperson, salesman, saleswoman, agent; rep one of our representatives will show you our new line of pop-up books

definitions.definition: an employee of a travel company who looks after the needs of its vacationing clients.
a person chosen or elected to speak and act on behalf of others in a legislative assembly or deliberative body.
examples: legislator, lawmaker; Moresenator, congressman, congresswoman, member of Congress, alderman, alderwoman, alderperson, selectman, selectwoman, lawmaker; voice "contact your representatives and urge them to protect our wetlands"Moresenator, congressman, congresswoman, member of Congress, alderman, alderwoman, alderperson, selectman, selectwoman, lawmaker; voice contact your representatives and urge them to protect our wetlands

definitions.definition: a delegate who attends a conference, negotiations, legal hearing, etc., so as to represent the interests of another person or group.
examples: delegate, commissioner, ambassador, attaché, envoy, emissary, chargé d'affaires, deputy the Cambodian representative at the UN

definitions.definition: a person who takes the place of another on a ceremonial or official occasion.
examples: deputy, substitute, stand-in, proxy he acted as his father's representative

definitions.definition: an example of a class or group.
examples: fossil representatives of lampreys and hagfishes
